title: Songs of the range
creator_credit: Castle Films and United World Films
brief_description: Country and western songs performed by some cowboys and a band including: “When its springtime in the Rockies” featuring Carson Robison and his Buckaroos “The Singing hills” featuring the Arthur Johnston Singers “Git along little pony” featuring the Wakely Trio.
